alert.note: Alert for Lapeer; Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lapeer, northern Macomb and west central St. Clair Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Almont, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Armada around 655 PM EDT. Memphis around 705 PM EDT. Richmond around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Berville, Riley Center and Allenton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
